div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Polio vaccine

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - No Doses at birth (polio-endemic country and high risk of spread)

description: Provide birth dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the zero dose recommendation at birth (until 2 weeks old) due to patient being in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread. Patient will continue the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread
Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread
Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread
Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread
"Polio-endemic country with high risk of spread" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - No Doses at 6 weeks old
description: Provide 1st dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at 6 weeks old
Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at 6 weeks old
Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at 6 weeks old

Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because no doses at 14 weeks old
Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because no doses at 14 weeks old

Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1 dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago
Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1 dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Polio - No Doses
description: Provide 1st dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "IPV Only" schedule

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 1st dose
Should vaccinate patient with IPV 1st dose
"High Coverage of Polio and Risk of Wild Importation" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient with IPV 1st dose

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 2nd dose
description: Provide 2nd dose Polio (IPV) vaccination - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 2nd dose
"High Coverage of Polio and Risk of Wild Importation" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient with IPV 2nd dose
Should vaccinate patient with IPV 2nd dose

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 4th dose (booster)
description: Provide 4th dose Polio (IPV) vaccination - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 4th dose (booster)
"Age when 1st IPV dose was given" < "8 weeks"

"High Coverage of Polio and Risk of Wild Importation" = TRUE
